div.p: Franklyn Bass, Ph.D., Interim Superintendent of Schools

div.div: Meal delivery service for our students continues.
Videos and information to keep our community up-to-date on what's happening in our district.
Latest update from NH Department of Health and Human Services.

If you are moving into Concord, please visit our online registration system at http://enroll.sau8.org/2019. If you have changed residence within the city, which may change the elementary school your child attends, please call the Transportation Department at 603-225-0849 to determine which school your child will attend.

div.p: Our vision is that all Concord students develop a passion for learning, experience excellence in their lives and believe that they have the ability to shape the future of their lives and communities.
